title: Putin, Gaza, tariffs and Mandelson: key details from Trump-Starmer press conference

title: Cost of private psychology soars in UK as practitioners turn away clients
description: Prices have risen by 34% since 2022, with 29% of psychologists refusing new patients
content:
The cost of seeing private psychologists is soaring and many are so busy they are turning away new clients, research has found.
The prices psychologists charge have risen by 34% since 2022 and 12 sessions now cost an average of £1,550, compared with ... [3172 chars]

description: Oscar-winning director Danny Boyle has an event planned for the May Bank holiday weekend next year.
content:

title: Google pushes emergency patch for Chrome 0-day

content:
